original_title: Belcebú versus Guerrero de Dios, la batalla final y el camino al paraíso
overview: Enrique Neira, a man abandoned by his wife and who deals with his schizophrenia and his son's obsessive-compulsive disorder, makes a movie about him being a priest and fighting with the demons who affects his life
title: Belcebú versus Guerrero de Dios, la batalla final y el camino al paraíso
